summary.subtext: I'm a passionate developer with expertise in creating modern web applications. My focus is on building intuitive, performant, and accessible user experiences using the latest technologies. Through my work, I strive to solve real-world problems and deliver solutions that make a difference.

contact.heading: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.

projects.heading: Projects
